title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added `fund=false` to `.npmrc` to silence funding messages during `npm ci`.
Updated documentation links for `GITHUB_TOKEN` permissions across multiple files to point to correct sections.
Added new GraphQL enum values (`ISSUE_COMMENT_PINNED_EVENT`, `ISSUE_COMMENT_UNPINNED_EVENT`) for issue and pull request timelines.

Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added `fund=false` to `.npmrc` to silence funding messages during `npm ci`.
- Updated documentation links for `GITHUB_TOKEN` permissions across multiple files to point to correct sections.
- Added new GraphQL enum values (`ISSUE_COMMENT_PINNED_EVENT`, `ISSUE_COMMENT_UNPINNED_EVENT`) for issue and pull request timelines.
